title: Walking in Faith
speaker: Pastor James Mitchell
description: What does it mean to truly walk by faith and not by sight? Pastor James explores the biblical definition of faith and how we can apply it to our daily lives.

title: The Power of Prayer
speaker: Pastor James Mitchell
description: Discover how prayer transforms not just our circumstances, but our hearts. Learn practical steps to develop a deeper prayer life.

title: Grace Upon Grace
speaker: Pastor James Mitchell
description: Understanding the boundless grace of God and how it shapes every aspect of our relationship with Him and others.

title: Community of Love
speaker: Pastor Sarah Chen
description: We were created for community. Explore how the love of God flows through us and into the lives of those around us.

title: Finding Purpose
speaker: Pastor James Mitchell
description: As we begin a new year, discover how God's plans for your life are filled with hope and purpose. A fresh start begins with seeking Him.

title: The Gift of Presence
speaker: Pastor Sarah Chen
description: Emmanuel â€” God with us. Reflecting on the greatest gift of Christmas: God choosing to dwell among us.
